task.title: Releasing Locks
task.shortdesc: If an object is locked by you you can release so that others can edit or annotate it.

taskbody.context: You must be the project administrator or the person who has locked the object to release the locks.

step.cmd: Hover over the Manage tab of the object you would like to unlock and select Properties from the dropdown list.
Click on remove the lock from this object, located in the banner below the menu bar (see below).
Click on Confirm to remove the lock.
step.info: If you release the lock, the object can be edited by anyone in your project or by the public (depending on the project access policies).

step.cmd: This takes you back to the object page.
step.info: If you would like to lock this object or have accidentally removed a lock you can click on the Lock object option in the menu bar.
